properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Glory to God in the highest.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And on earth peace to men,
peace to men
who are God's friends.
Glory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God almighty Father
heavenly King,
we praise you and
we bless you.
Glory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We adore you
we glorify you,
we give you thanks
for your great glory.
Glory.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord Jesus Christ
only son of the Father,
Lord Lamb of God
Jesus Christ.
Glory.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You take away
the sins of the world,
have mercy
receive our prayers.
Glory.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are seated
at the right hand of the Father,
have mercy
Lord Jesus Christ.
Glory.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You alone are holy,
you alone are Lord,
you alone are most high.
Glory.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Glory to the Father,
glory to the Son,
glory to the Spirit
world without end.
Glory.
